Summary: an object hovering in the sky zigzaging up and down, side to side, then a spark of light and 4-6 round objects released shooting downward, then a spark again and the craft quickly disappears leaving a ray of light.
divs: sighting detailsi honestly cannot recall the date but i know for sure it was in the summer\fall of 2004 that we saw the first one, because i was taking a class at the travis airforce base and they wouldn't let anyone off the base for about an hour. finally they let us go and my husband called me on my cell to tell me there is a ufo in the sky. he had one of those lights that have a billion watts and pointed at it and it came toward them and freaked them out. i came home and watched from my house and saw it zigzag back and forth then stopping in midair hovering and then there was a flash of light and 4-6 objects shot out of it downward and then the object left. it happened again in january i believe. me and my son joked around and would looked if we saw our friends in the sky...and they came again...and again... we've noticed they been coming every two months. there was an incident were there were crop circles before all this happened. my son woke me up last month about 4 or so in the morning to show me the object in the sky...he was flashing the light at it and it would follow it if he moved it to the left and then when he moved it to the right and it followed. it scared me so i made him stop. but i want you to know that i will try to be more thorough and try to get a video of it. i saw a broadcast on the tv... so i decided to tell you guys what is going on here in fairfield late at night.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Fairfield
There was one other sighting in Fairfield on or around August 31st 2004
